faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: You can upgrade your membership level at any time on the membership page, and it will take effect immediately after paying the corresponding fee.
faq.a2: After logging into your account, all membership benefits will be automatically activated, and you can directly use the corresponding tools and services.
faq.a3: We offer a 7-day no-reason refund guarantee. If you are not satisfied with the service, you can apply for a refund within 7 days of purchase.
faq.q4: How long is the membership valid?
faq.a4: The validity period of paid membership is one year, calculated from the date of purchase. Registered membership is permanently valid.
